text: Virginia's 6th House of Delegates district is one of 100 seats in the Virginia House of Delegates, the lower house of the state's bicameral legislature. District 6 covers all of Carroll County, Wythe County, and portions of Smyth County, Virginia. The district is represented by Republican Delegate Jeff Campbell. ==District officeholders== {| class=wikitable style="text- align:center" |- valign=bottom ! Years ! colspan=2 | Delegate ! Party !
